content:
(Guilty) Every time I stay up late, 
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color> stays up with me too... 
I feel kinda bad about it...
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
"Eating late-night congee" means you're good at kung fu,
so I have a bowl of congee every night before bed!
<size=30>Though eating too much makes it hard to fall asleep.</size>
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
<size=64><color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color></size>!
Phew—I finally said it!
I've always wanted to call out your name like that!

content:
I'm really trying to develop a habit of going to bed early...
<size=64>Really!</size>

content:
The weather is so nice today,
I should take out the cleaned plum blossom stakes to sun them.
<size=30>Wait... did I bring in the plum blossom stakes I put out last time?</size>

content:
They say if you turn on the TV at night,
you might see programs that "don't exist"...
That's just an urban legend... right?

content:
Just because it's sunny outside doesn't mean your clothes will dry quickly.
If you hang them near water,
they'll take a long time to dry even on a sunny day.
info: 闲聊-关于天气闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
(Proudly)
This is the life philosophy that I, Manna, took forever to figure out!
